Module for loading Quran data from a text file. Contains functions to read, parse, and return Quran verses as a list of dictionaries.

functions.name: load_quran_text
functions.description: Load Quran text from a file. Reads the file and parses each line formatted as 'surah_number|ayah_number|verse_text'.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

functions.description: Alias for load_quran_text, providing backward compatibility for loading Quran data.

parameters.name: file_path
parameters.description: Path to the Quran text file.

files.description: Module for searching words in the loaded Quran data. It provides multiple functions to perform diverse search operations on Quran data including word searches, phrase (word group) searches, verse range searches, word count based searches, and gematrical value calculations.

functions.name: search_word_in_quran
functions.description: Search for a word in the Quran verses. Iterates over the provided Quran data and returns a list of verses containing the search word. Supports both case-sensitive and case-insensitive search modes.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: search_word
parameters.description: The word to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: If True, performs case-sensitive search; otherwise, case-insensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group
functions.description: Search for a specific word group (phrase) in the Quran verses. Iterates over the Quran data to find verses that contain the exact phrase, with support for case-sensitive and case-insensitive searches.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (exact phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: If True, performs case-sensitive search; otherwise, case-insensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a word within a specific Surah in the Quran data by filtering based on the surah number and then checking if the word appears in the verse text.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to search within.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: The loaded Quran data.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_surah
functions.description: Search for a word group (phrase) within a specific Surah by filtering the Quran data based on surah number and then checking for the phrase in the verse text with an option for case sensitivity.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (exact phrase) to search for in the verse text.

parameters.name: surah_number
parameters.description: The Surah number to filter verses.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: If True, performs case-sensitive search; otherwise, case-insensitive search. Defaults to False.

functions.name: count_word_occurrences
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a given word in the Quran data. The search is performed in a case-insensitive manner.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word whose occurrences need to be counted.

functions.name: count_word_group_occurrences
functions.description: Count the total number of occurrences of a word group (phrase) in the Quran data in a case-insensitive manner.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to count occurrences of.

functions.name: search_word_in_verse_range
functions.description: Search for a word within a specified verse range in the Quran. It checks verses that fall within the given start and end verse (as tuples of surah and ayah numbers) and supports case-sensitive or case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word
parameters.description: The word to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: The starting verse of the range as a tuple (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: The ending verse of the range as a tuple (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Whether the search is case-sensitive. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_word_group_in_verse_range
functions.description: Search for a word group within a specified verse range in the Quran. It returns verses where the word group is found within the given range, with support for case-sensitive or case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran data.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: start_verse
parameters.description: The starting verse of the range as a tuple (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: end_verse
parameters.description: The ending verse of the range as a tuple (surah_number, ayah_number).

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: Whether the search is case-sensitive. Defaults to False.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count
functions.description: Search for Quran verses that contain exactly the specified number of words.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_count
parameters.description: The desired number of words in a verse.

functions.name: search_verses_by_word_count_multiple
functions.description: Search for Quran verses where the number of words is a multiple of a specified number. Raises ValueError if the provided multiple is zero.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: multiple_of
parameters.description: The integer multiple to check against. Must be a non-zero integer.

functions.name: calculate_gematrical_value
functions.description: Calculate the gematrical (Abjad) value of a given Arabic word or phrase by summing the numerical values of its characters based on a predefined mapping.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: An Arabic word or phrase.

functions.name: search_words_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Search for individual words in the Quran that have a specified gematrical value by calculating the value for each word and matching it to the target.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value to match.

functions.name: search_word_groups_by_gematrical_value
functions.description: Search for verses in the Quran where a specific word group is found and its gematrical value matches a target value. Supports both case-sensitive and case-insensitive search.

parameters.name: quran_data
parameters.description: List of dictionaries representing Quran verses.

parameters.name: word_group
parameters.description: The word group (phrase) to search for.

parameters.name: target_value
parameters.description: The target gematrical value to match for the word group.

parameters.name: case_sensitive
parameters.description: If True, performs a case-sensitive search; otherwise, performs case-insensitive search. Defaults to False.

files.description: Main entry point for the Quran search application. It loads Quran data and performs various search operations using functions from the quran_search module, then prints the results.

functions.name: main
functions.description: Main function to load Quran data and perform search operations. It demonstrates functionalities including word search, word group search, verse range queries, word count based searches, and gematrical value calculations, with results printed to the console.
